original_title: Sri Lanka’s mid day shares edge up
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘ shares edged up in mid day trade on Monday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 0.81 percent or 94.11 points to 11,727, while the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 1.85 percent or 63.25 points to 3,474.31.
The market generated a turnover of 1.8 billion rupees during 1200 hours.
Gainers during mid day trade were John Keells Holdings, Commercial Bank and Melstacorp. (Colombo/Aug07/2023)
